resources.string:
This Password Generator is a simple, user-friendly Android application designed to help users create and manage secure passwords. The app offers several features to ensure that the passwords generated are strong and difficult to guess.


•	Features:
 
• Random Password Generation: Create complex passwords using numbers, letters, and special characters. 
• Customizable Passwords: Users can choose whether to include letters and special characters in their passwords. 
• Password Management: Save and manage generated passwords within the app. Edit and Delete: Easily edit or delete saved passwords. 
• User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive UI for a smooth user experience.
